title: D.C. I&II P.S.P. Re-Animated
synopsis: An OVA bundled with a PSP game Da Capo: D.C. I & II P.S.P. It features animated confession scenes for the four main heroines of the two games, Nemu, Kotori, Yume, and Otome.
characters: ['Shirakawa, Kotori', 'Asakura, Nemu', 'Asakura, Otome', 'Asakura, Yume', 'Asakura, Junichi', 'Sakurai, Yoshiyuki']
voices: ['Horie, Yui', 'Nogawa, Sakura', 'Takagaki, Ayahi', 'Horie, Yui', 'Tai, Yuuki', 'Asanuma, Shintaro']
staff: [['Circus', ['Original Creator']], ['Koyama, Kenji', ['Sound Effects']], ['Takashina, Yuka', ['Character Design']], ['Iwaida, You', ['Color Design']]]
